example.parse: (S (NP-TPC-1 (PUNC ") (DET+NOUN_QUANT+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC الغالبية) (DET+ADJ_COMP العظمى) (PUNC ")) (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تفضل) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ أل) (S (VP (PRT (NEG_PART ا)) (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S تتحالف) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_NOM الولايات) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM المتحدة)) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC مع) (NP (NP (NOUN_QUANT+CASE_INDEF_GEN أي)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_DU_GEN الجانبين)))))

verb.comment: EGYPTIAN ARABIC Framefile based on taHAlaf
